channel.title: Christian Paradis
channel.description: Recent news about Christian Paradis, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Christian Paradis' Stay At Businessman's Hunting Lodge Cleared By Ethics ...
OTTAWA - The federal ethics watchdog has cleared cabinet minister Christian Paradis for spending two nights at the hunting lodge of a Quebec businessman who was pushing for a new hockey arena in the province. Conflict of Interest and Ethics Commissioner ... Paradis previously had his knuckles rapped by Dawson when, as public works minister, he directed his officials to set up special meetings in 2009 with former Conservative MP Rahim Jaffer to discuss a private project. item.title: Mentioned by NBCSports.com
item.description:
Conservative MP cleared of ethics violation related to Quebec City arena
In news we probably wouldn't pass along if not for the fact it's August, Canada's ethics watchdog ruled today that Conservative MP Christian Paradis did not violate the country's Conflict of Interest Act by accepting a two-night stay at the hunting lodge of ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Federal government promises $60M to help rebuild Lac-Mégantic
Christian Paradis, MP for the riding of Mégantic-L'Érable and the minister of International Development, was in Lac-Mégantic to announce the federal aid. MP Christian Paradis in Lac-Mégantic on Monday afternoon. (Radio-Canada). Lac-Mégantic Mayor ...

item.title: Mentioned by Carstairs Courier
item.description:
Feds announce $60-million for Lac-Megantic disaster recovery
